name: FairyLink
description:
Puzzle Platformer about using fairy to collect key and crystal

====Note====

The Level select menu is not working  because I can't make it in time, but actually I can't make the level in time too, so it only have 3 levels.

Collect Key to open the door and go to the crystal

Red laser will kill the witch

Blue laser will will the fairy

==== Control ====

[Arrow] to move

[C] to Send fairy out [C] again to Call fairy back

(Can send 2 times / reset on ground or wall)

[X] to jump (can wall jump)

[X] or [Z] while send fairy out to pull witch to fairy

[R] to reset
